home.description: The Advanced Encryption Standard is the most popular symmetric-key cipher. If you want to learn the basics, dig deep into the details, or experiment with AES: you're in the right place!

settings.title: Settings
settings.badLang: Is your language poorly translated or unavailable?

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.body: This is a developing project and we would love to get your feedback on the tool. There is a{googleFormLink}that you can fill out to give us some highly valuable information - your thoughts! Alternatively, the creators of AES Adventure are listed below, feel free to send us an email if you're having issues with the tool.

modal.title: Configure
modal.body: Select configurations below. When selecting multiple configurations for comparison, the last selected configuration will be walked through step-by-step. If you are new to AES, we recommend that you use the default simulator before using this configuration.

tutorial.title: Tutorial
tutorial.description: Click on {tutorialIcon} that you see to reveal relevant information here. There may be light explanations, deep details, interactive simulators and more!
tutorial.tip: Tip! Expand this sidebar to free up more room for the tutorial by dragging on the resizer in the bottom right corner.

fill.title: Fill
fill.description: Auto-fill this input by selecting one of the preset options below. Note: this will override the current content of the input.
